00011 template <typename T>
00012 struct to_python_value< ndarray::tables::Table<T> const & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00013     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::tables::Table<T> const & x) const {
00014         numpy::dtype dtype = ndarray::tables::makeNumpyType(x.getLayout());
00015         object owner = makePyObject(x.getManager());
00016         std::vector<Py_intptr_t> shape_char(1, x.getSize());
00017         std::vector<Py_intptr_t> strides_char(1, x.getStride());
00018         numpy::ndarray array = numpy::from_data(x.getRaw(), dtype, shape_char, strides_char, owner);
00019         Py_INCREF(array.ptr());
00020         return array.ptr();
00021     }
00022     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00023         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::ndarray>::get_pytype();
00024     }
00025 };
00026 
00027 template <typename T>
00028 struct to_python_value< ndarray::tables::Table<T> & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00029     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::tables::Table<T> & x) const {
00030         return to_python_value< ndarray::tables::Table<T> const & >()(x);
00031     }
00032     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00033         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::ndarray>::get_pytype();
00034     }
00035 };

00037 namespace converter {

00039 template <typename T>
00040 struct arg_to_python< ndarray::tables::Table<T> > : public handle<> {
00041     inline arg_to_python(ndarray::tables::Table<T> const & v) :
00042         handle<>(to_python_value<ndarray::tables::Table<T> const &>()(v)) {}
00043 };
00044 
00045 template <typename T>
00046 struct arg_rvalue_from_python< ndarray::tables::Table<T> const & > {
00047     typedef ndarray::tables::Table<T> result_type;
00048     typedef typename ndarray::tables::detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Raw Raw;
00049     typedef typename ndarray::tables::detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Layout_ Layout_;
00050 
00051     static numpy::ndarray::bitflag const flags = 
00052         numpy::ndarray::bitflag(
00053             (boost::is_const<T>::value ? int(numpy::ndarray::WRITEABLE) : 0) |
00054             int(numpy::ndarray::ALIGNED)
00055         );
00056 
00057     arg_rvalue_from_python(PyObject * p) : arg(python::detail::borrowed_reference(p)) {}
00058 
00059     bool convertible() const {
00060         try {
00061             numpy::ndarray array = extract<numpy::ndarray>(arg);
00062             if (array.get_nd() != 1) return false;
00063         } catch (error_already_set) {
00064             handle_exception();
00065             PyErr_Clear();
00066             return false;
00067         }
00068         return true;
00069     }
00070 
00071     result_type operator()() const {
00072         numpy::ndarray array = extract<numpy::ndarray>(arg);
00073         numpy::dtype dtype = array.get_dtype();
00074         Layout_ layout;
00075         ndarray::tables::fillLayout(dtype, layout);
00076         object obj_owner = array.get_base();
00077         if (obj_owner == object()) {
00078             obj_owner = array;
00079         }
00080         int size = array.shape(0);
00081         int stride = array.strides(0);
00082         ndarray::tables::Table<T> r = ndarray::tables::Table<T>::external(
00083             reinterpret_cast<Raw*>(array.get_data()), size, stride, layout, obj_owner
00084         );
00085         return r;
00086     }
00087 
00088     mutable object arg;
00089 };
00090 
00091 template <typename T>
00092 struct extract_rvalue< ndarray::tables::Table<T> > : private noncopyable {
00093     typedef ndarray::tables::Table<T> result_type;
00094 
00095     extract_rvalue(PyObject * x) : m_converter(x) {}
00096 
00097     bool check() const { return m_converter.convertible(); }
00098     
00099     result_type operator()() const { return m_converter(); }
00100 
00101 private:
00102     arg_rvalue_from_python< result_type const & > m_converter;
00103 };
00104 
00105 }} // namespace python::converter

00107 namespace numpy {
00108 
00109 template <typename T>
00110 numpy::ndarray array(::ndarray::tables::Table<T> const & arg) {
00111     python::to_python_value< ::ndarray::tables::Table<T> const & > converter;
00112     numpy::ndarray result(python::detail::new_reference(converter(arg)));
00113     return result;
00114 }
